reviewText: Martial Arts Marathon V. 2 - Double Feature. BLOOD OF THE DRAGON: Wang Yu, martial arts expert, battles a plethora of hostile warriors. Killing everyone he meets, at one point, the tireless antagonist subdues 100 men at the same time. BRUCE'S FIST OF VENGEANCE: This time it's Bruce Le who possesses the fists of vengeance, after been given the secret martial arts book of Bruce Lee, by his good friend Jack Lee. Bruce Le must defend the secret book from an evil kung-fu expert Don Gordon who will stop at nothing to gain its secrets.
